title: State v. Shaurn Thomas – Addendum 3 – District Attorney
description:
October 5, 2017 / Rabia interviews Attorney Larry Krasner, frontrunner for the Philadelphia District Attorney’s election this November, in a nationally watched race. Krasner, a career criminal defense and civil rights attorney, promises to undo decades of destructive criminal justice policies if elected.

Today’s addendum is supported by Mack Weldon, Kind, and Quicken.

Mack Weldon – Get 20% off your order by going to www.mackweldon.com and using promo code UNDISCLOSED.

Kind – Sign up for Kind bars and get a free sample box include 10 bars! Go to www.kindsnacks.com/undisclosed. 

Rocket Mortgage by Quicken Loans gives you the confidence you need when it comes to buying a home or refinancing. Go to www.rocketmortgage.com/undisclosed today. 

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

#undisclosed  #udaddendum
